body_html: This is tricky, but arguably this is a bug and should be fixed, as the layer originally came with a well-specified initialisation (1x multiplier, +0 bias) and this was not put in properly. I can't say for certain, but this may even be a cause for some reported discrepancies in performance between PyTorch and other frameworks.
body_text: This is tricky, but arguably this is a bug and should be fixed, as the layer originally came with a well-specified initialisation (1x multiplier, +0 bias) and this was not put in properly. I can't say for certain, but this may even be a cause for some reported discrepancies in performance between PyTorch and other frameworks.
body: This is tricky, but arguably this is a bug and should be fixed, as the layer originally came with a well-specified initialisation (1x multiplier, +0 bias) and this was not put in properly. I can't say for certain, but this may even be a cause for some reported discrepancies in performance between PyTorch and other frameworks.
